name: PyKronos
short_description: PyKronos is a Python module, that can display time in a Tkinter window or just print it. Download ZIP file (includes README.txt) at http://colpik.ic.cz/pykronos/pykronos_latest.zip or just the python source at http://colpik.ic.cz/pykronos/pykronos.py
